page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN KILTARLITY
page.content: The area is mainly agricultural and most employment is farming based,though some forestry related work is carried out.An old sawmill in the village was recently modernised and now provides some local jobs. Tourism also provides seasonal employment for many local people.There are a number of building-related businesses and a unique crafts company which exports hand painted pewter miniature figures world wide. There is a garden centre which specialises in growing lilies for mail order. Many people in the area,however,do travel to the larger centres of population such as Inverness for employment.Unemployment in the area is low compared with the Regional average.
